goal: My GoCalendar is blocked for a mandatory conference from March 8th to 12th. I want to plan a four day, three night international trip immediately following it, departing from IAD. The total combined cost for the round-trip flight on FlyUnified and a StayNB with a kitchen must be under $1500. Pick any major European city. Once you find a suitable combination, block out my calendar for 'Europe Trip' and add the confirmation number and StayNB booking link to the event notes.

evals.description: Verify a round-trip flight was booked on FlyUnified departing from IAD to a European city, from March 13th to March 16th.
evals.query: flyunified.differences.bookedFlights.added[?origin=='IAD' && departureDate=='2024-03-13' && returnDate=='2024-03-16' && (destination=='London' || destination=='Paris' || destination=='Rome' || destination=='Madrid' || destination=='Berlin' || destination=='Amsterdam' || destination=='Dublin' || destination=='Lisbon')]

evals.description: Verify a StayNB with a kitchen was booked for the same dates in the destination city.
Verify a 'Europe Trip' event was added to the GoCalendar from March 13th to March 16th.
Verify the GoCalendar 'Europe Trip' event notes contain both a flight confirmation number and a StayNB booking link.
